title: Authors and Citation
text: Williams B, Hulson P, Bryan M (2022). swo: Survey workload optimization. https://github.com/BenWilliams-NOAA/swo/, https://benwilliams-noaa.github.io/swo/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {swo: Survey workload optimization},   author = {Ben Williams and Pete Hulson and Meaghan Bryan},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/BenWilliams-NOAA/swo/, https://benwilliams-noaa.github.io/swo/}, }

title: Survey workload optimization
text: can install development version swo GitHub :

title: Survey workload optimization
text: basic example shows query data GOA AI:
code: library(swo) yrs = 2017 species = c(10110, 21740) region = 'GOA' afsc_user = 'your_afsc_username' afsc_pwd = 'your_afsc_pwd'  query_data(region, species, yrs, afsc_user, afsc_pwd)  cpue <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'cpue_goa.csv')) lfreq <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'lfreq_goa.csv')) strata <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'strata_goa.csv')) specimen <- vroom::vroom(here::here('data', 'specimen_goa.csv'))  swo(lfreq, specimen, cpue, strata, yrs = 2017, boot_hauls = TRUE,     boot_lengths = TRUE, boot_ages = TRUE, length_samples = 100, sex_samples = 50)

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Query racebase — query_data
code: query_data(region, species, yrs = NULL, afsc_user, afsc_pwd)

title: Query racebase — query_data
text: region specific region data ('GOA', 'AI') species species_codes e.g., c(10110, 21740) yrs minimum year consider (default = NULL) afsc_user afsc database username afsc_pwd afsc database password

what: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
primary survey workload optimization function — swo
code: swo(   lfreq_data,   specimen_data,   cpue_data,   strata_data,   yrs = NULL,   strata = FALSE,   boot_hauls = FALSE,   boot_lengths = FALSE,   boot_ages = FALSE,   length_samples = NULL,   sex_samples = NULL )

title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
text: lfreq_data length frequency data specimen_data age-length specimen data cpue_data abundance length data strata_data strata associated area yrs age filter (returns years >=) strata switch analyzing strata (default = NULL) - currently implemented boot_hauls switch resampling hauls (default = NULL) boot_lengths switch resampling lengths (default = NULL) boot_ages switch resampling ages (default = NULL) length_samples change sample sizes (default = NULL) sex_samples change sample sizes (default = NULL)

title: primary survey workload optimization function — swo
code: swo(lfreq, specimen, cpue, strata_data, yrs = 2015, boot_hauls = TRUE,     boot_lengths = TRUE, length_samples = 100)
